sentences.en: A poet is one who can convert ordinary words into a meaningful and effective piece of writing.
sentences.cn: 诗人是能够用普通的文字写出寓意深刻、感人至深的作品的人.

sentences.en: Arnold directed a meaningful look at Irma.
sentences.cn: 阿诺德意味深长地看了艾尔玛一眼。

sentences.en: Emittance and irradiance are meaningful measurements of flux at a specific surface.
sentences.cn: 发射强度和辐照强度只有对一定表面上通量的量度才是有意义的.

sentences.en: He asked people to tell him about a meaningful event or period in their lives.
sentences.cn: 他让人们讲讲他们生命中的重要事件或者阶段。

sentences.en: He gave me a sly, meaningful look.
sentences.cn: 他心照不宣地看了我一眼，意味深长。

sentences.en: Instead of rushing at life, I wanted something more meaningful.
sentences.cn: 我不想混日子，我想做点更有意义的事情。

sentences.en: It will be meaningful, however, to discuss the phenomenon briefly.
sentences.cn: 然而, 简要地讨论一下这种现象仍然有意义.

sentences.en: Its refined terminology and class distinctions are frequently meaningful for engineering work.
sentences.cn: 其精练的名词术语与分类特征常常对工程是有意义的.

sentences.en: Sam and Barbara exchanged meaningful glances.
sentences.cn: 萨姆和芭芭拉交换了会意的眼神。

sentences.en: Suddenly all of the bizarre and seemingly isolated examples took on a meaningful focus.
sentences.cn: 突然之间，所有那些怪异且看上去孤立的例子都具有了意义。

sentences.en: Teaching history to five-year-olds in a meaningful way can be very difficult.
sentences.cn: 给五岁的孩子用他们能够明白的方式讲授历史很难。

sentences.en: The company was one of the first to offer meaningful employment to the blind.
sentences.cn: 这家公司是为盲人提供有意义工作的先驱之一.

sentences.en: The couple exchanged meaningful glances but said nothing.
sentences.cn: 夫妻俩意味深长地交换了一下眼色,但什么都没说.

sentences.en: The crickets stridulated their everlasting monotonous meaningful note.
sentences.cn: 蟋蟀发出了它们持久的,单调而有意思的调子.

sentences.en: The remarks are meaningful and thought - provoking.

sentences.cn: 他们彼此意味深长地交换了一下眼色.

sentences.en: This separation allows the generalization of test results and meaningful stability data.
sentences.cn: 这种区别有助于归纳试验结果和积累有用的稳定性数据.

sentences.en: Without more data we cannot make a meaningful comparison of the two systems.
sentences.cn: 如果没有更多的数据，我们就无法对这两个体系作有意义的比较。

words.tran_cn: 有意义地；意味深长地；有意图地

trans.tran_cn: 意味深长的，有意义的，有意图的，隽
trans.tran_en: having a meaning that is easy to understand and makes sense
